languages.text: [Взглянуть на одинокую кружку Калькасара] "Да уж, гостеприимством Инквизиция не блещет".
[Look at Calcazar's solitary cup] "Hospitality is not the Inquisition's forte, I see."

languages.text: [看着卡尔卡扎桌上唯一的咖啡杯]“看来审判庭并不擅长招待客人。”
languages.original_text: [Look at Calcazar's solitary cup] "Hospitality is not the Inquisition's forte, I see."

traits.locale_text: [看着卡尔卡扎桌上唯一的咖啡杯]“看来审判庭并不擅长招待客人。”

languages.text: [Mirar la taza solitaria de Calcazar] «Veo que la hospitalidad no es el punto fuerte de la Inquisición».
languages.original_text: [Look at Calcazar's solitary cup] "Hospitality is not the Inquisition's forte, I see."

traits.locale_text: [Mirar la taza solitaria de Calcazar] «Veo que la hospitalidad no es el punto fuerte de la Inquisición».

languages.text: [カルカサルにだけ出されたカップを見る]「なるほど、もてなしは異端審問庁の得意分野ではないということか」
languages.original_text: [Look at Calcazar's solitary cup] "Hospitality is not the Inquisition's forte, I see."

languages.text: [Observer la tasse de Calcazar] « Je vois que l'hospitalité ne fait pas partie des prérogatives de l'Inquisition. »
languages.original_text: [Look at Calcazar's solitary cup] "Hospitality is not the Inquisition's forte, I see."

languages.text: [Calcazars Tasse ansehen] "Gastfreundschaft ist keine Stärke der Inquisition, wie ich sehe."

languages.text: [Calcazar'ın tek bardağına bak] "Engizisyon, misafirperverlikten pek anlamıyor herhâlde."
